name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail Accelerator Pro for Sage CRM

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and File Emails, Create entities like Company, Person, Opportunties and more including custom entities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sage CRM Customers can now surface their Customer data (and more) without leaving GMail.

Are you tired of the cumbersome task of manually copying and pasting emails into your CRM system?
Does your sales team often neglect updating CRM with crucial contact details?
Are you struggling with low overall CRM user adoption? 

Look no further, as we have the perfect solution for you.

*** Key Features ***

Search and/or Create:
-Company
-Person
-Opportunity
-Cases
-Leads
-Custom Primary Entities

Drill in to view:
-Opportunities
-Cases
-Notes
-Contacts
-Communications
-Library

File Emails and Log Call notes against Entities

For more information see our help at: https://accelerator.crmtogether.com/

** Requires that you have Sage CRM and our Server Module installed (which requires an additional purchase from CRM Together) **
